dt-option.name: select.toggleable
dt-option.summary: Disable the deselection of selected rows when clicked

type.description: Enable the toggleable option of Select (`true`) or not (`false`).

dt-option.description: This option provides the ability to disable the deselection of selected rows when they are clicked. As standard when a selected row is clicked it will be deselected. When the `-init select.toggleable` option is set to `false` then it will disable this feature and selected rows will not deselect when they are clicked.

example.title: Disable the deselection of selected rows when clicked
